alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 8:07PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Hampshire and Franklin Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 805 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near North Adams to Lenox. Movement was east at 35 mph. These storms produced wind gusts to 40 to 50 mph in North Adams and Pittsfield. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Amherst, Northampton, Greenfield, Deerfield, Monroe, Montague, Hadley, Sunderland, Hatfield, Northfield, Williamsburg, Bernardston, Buckland, Conway, Shelburne, Leverett, Erving, Shutesbury, Ashfield and Colrain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampshire
